      • setID

        private void setID(int id)
        this must be called within each constructor to make sure the ID is set correctly. It verifies that the value passed to the method is greater or equal to the next valid ID, before setting the ID and incrementing the next valid ID
        Parameters:
        id - the id of entity

        public boolean intersects(BaseGameEntity entity)
        Checks whether the current entity intersects with the given one
        Parameters:
        entity - BaseGameEntity instance we want to check if the this instance is intersecting with
        Returns:
        true if the hit-boxes of two entities intersect and false otherwise

      • getHitBox

        public abstract Shape getHitBox()
        Gets the hit-box of the entity

        Hit-box is a shape with size and location properties. In most cases it is either a circle or a rectangle.

        Returns:
        the shape of the hit-box

      • getHitBoxRadius

        public abstract double getHitBoxRadius()
        Gets the outer radius of the hit-box

        If it's a circle it gets its radius, if its any other shape, it gets the radius of the outer circle that would be generated around the hit-box.

        Returns:
        size of hit-box radius
